1.content:
Anthony "Tony" Stark, AKA Iron Man, is without a doubt Avengers Academy's most famous hero. And he knows this very well, doing his best to womanize every girl on the academy. He tries getting with everyone! Janet, Nat, Kamala, Maria, even Madame Hydra!

But recently he's had strange feelings. It's probably not love in the traditional sense... But rather love for something in particular.

The Hot Tub, Stark Tower
"...Tony? Tony! Tony are you listening to me?!" Pepper was nagging at Tony to train and study harder, but for some reason he was even more lost than usual. "Huh? Yeah I'm listening. Something about fighting Hydra or the same thing we train for everyday. I'll think of something to make. " He retorted, with that same sarcastic charm he always speaks with. "Well, that's the general gist of what I was saying. But anyways, listen Tony, you need group up..." He zoned out after that, having lost himself in though, but it certainly wasn't about beating up Hydra goons.

"Man, Pepper sure is cute. I dunno why she wouldn't wanna get with me. But man... Those heels she's wearing look hot! I wonder if she'd care to kick 'em off and... Uh... Yeah actually just kick 'em off. Her feet must look pretty nice..." Tony thought. "TONY!" She shouted at him. "Huh wah?!" Tony's head fell into the water and immediately came back out, shaking his head like a dog drying his fur. "So do you understand your mission Tony?" Tony gave her a blank look. "Ugh... Listen, just find one of the girls..."

Tony cut her off. "Yeah yeah I got it Pepper. Just leave it to me!" He had 0 idea of what he was actually supposed to do, but he didn't exactly care, he zoned out after the word 'girl.' "Alright then Tony. I'll see you later." Pepper walked back downstairs, and out of Tony's sight.

Tony was a bit confused with his thought process earlier. "I usually think about girls all the time but.. Why was I so focused on Pepper's feet? I don't have a thing for feet... Do I?" Tony was sat in his hot tub for a bit, then decided on his course of action. He dried off, put on his clothes, spiked out his hair and headed to the dorm. He was gonna figure out if he really does like feet, and what better way than a one-on-one experience?

He headed to....
1.title: The Journey Begins

choices: Natasha answers in full gear, ready to leave. What's going on?
Natasha answers and Tony can't think of what to say.
Natasha answers and Tony blurts out he wants to find out if he has a foot fetish
12.content:
Whatever Pepper had been trying to tell Stark was lost on him. He had more important things to take care of and that was to find out if he really had a thing for women's feet or not. What better way than to find out with Natasha Romanoff. The woman was breathtakingly beautiful and had done all sorts of things to get close to targets so she would be well aware of kinky things.

Hmm but how to best approach it... he really should of that of that before knocking on her dorm!
12.title: Natasha Romanoff (Black Widow)

15.content: Any of these girls intrest you?

Guardians of the Galaxy; Mantis, Gamora AND Nebula

155333.content: She's an Avenger in the comics, so how about the deadly to the touch southern belle Rogue?
155333.title: More

info.brief_description: Tony indulges in his secret foot fetish with the girls of Marvel's Avengers Academy.
info.description:
(Also, I apologise to anyone who liked the original idea of the story, I figured telling the story from the perspective of an actual character would be easier.)
(Also, In case it's not obvious, all these characters and their personalities are taken from the phone game Avengers Academy. http://avengers-academy.wikia.com/wiki/Avengers_Academy_Wiki)

You take the role of the famous, young superhero, Tony Stark. A famous "ladykiller" who every gives a shot at every girl, but what they don't know is his foot fetish! And frankly, neither does he! Until this story.

Rules:
1) No guys allowed other than Tony.
2) Only girl feet.
3) Stick to feet related stuff, but blowjobs and handjobs are ok.
4) No rape.
5) NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS. I will delete them otherwise. Also, please have good grammar.
6) Have fun!

(ps: Alot of this writing is based on how howdyboy writes his feet stories, if he somehow comes across this story, you rock dude. See you around on foot-fetish-booru sometimes I'd hope.)
